questions.question_text: What brand of cigarettes do you consider your regular brand?
In the past 3 months, what other brands of cigarettes have you tried, even counting those cigarettes you 'borrowed' from someone else?
Aside from those you've already mentioned, what other brands of cigarettes have you seen, heard about, or are aware of?
What brands of cigarettes have you recently seen advertising for?
For each brand mentioned in Q.4, what do you remember about the advertising ... that is, what was shown or said about in the advertising?
Finally, I'd like to read several statements made by various cigarette brands. After I read each one, will you please tell me the brand you know or think uses this statement. What brand uses:

statements.statement: You've come a long way, baby
A lot of taste without a lot of tar
Slashed tar in half. Only 5 milligrams tar

classification.question_text: Into which age group do you belong? Are you ...
